articles.title: Deepak Chahar Pulls Out of South Africa ODIs, Mohammed Shami Ruled Out of Test Series - News18
articles.description: Deepak Chahar informed the BCCI that he will not be available for the upcoming ODI series due to a family medical emergency. Shami ruled out of the Test series due to fitness issues.
articles.content: Deepak Chahar has pulled out of the forthcoming ODI series against South Africa, starting Sunday in Johannesburg. The right-arm quick has informed the BCCI that he will not be available for the upcom… [+2035 chars]

articles.title: KL Rahul confirms Samson's role in SA ODIs, drops major hint on Rinku's debut - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ahead of the series, Rahul, who will be leading India in the three-match ODI contest against South Africa, addressed Samson's role in the series. | Cricket
articles.content: Sanju Samson was in the reckoning for the ODI World Cup squad for as late as August when he was named in the Sri Lanka-bound Asia Cup team, albeit as a back-up for injured KL Rahul. However, with the… [+2355 chars]
